created_by: Olaf Hartong, Florian Roth, Aleksey Potapov, oscd.community
name: CobaltStrike Process Injection
description: Detects a possible remote threat creation with certain characteristics which are typical for Cobalt Strike beacons
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`winlog.event_data.StartAddress:(*0B80 OR *0C7C OR *0C88)`
